nodes.text: Sal Dakron was a male Human officer of the Corellian Security Force living on Corellia during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY, he and a few other Corellian resistance members fought against Imperial forces and the Coronas gang of former councillor Harmon Torvix in the Black Hole region of the Labor Valley.
Sal Dakron appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC in the Black Hole, involved in the quest "Corellia Rising."
